member.name: M:Samraksh.SPOT.Hardware.Accelerometer.#ctor(System.Int32,Samraksh.SPOT.Hardware.Accelerometer.AxlCallbackType)
member.summary: Initializes the i2c and the accelerometer sensor
member.param: controls the rate at which the driver samples the accelerometer
user callback function, if null the user is not intimated of changes in sensor values and should use polling
